altername_name: 藤堂龙之介侦探日记 - 琥珀色的遗言
name: Toudou Ryuunosuke Tantei Nikki: Kohakuiro no Yuigon: Seiyou Karuta Renzoku Satsujin Jiken
overview: Toudou Ryuunosuke Tantei Nikki: Kohakuiro no Yuigon is an Adventure game, developed by althi Inc. and published by fonfun, which was released in Japan in 2008.
